column1: Uchi////And I must say that I saved the best for last
column2: the Hamachi Nabe: Steaming Koshi Hikari Rice with baby Yellowtail
column4: served in a soy broth. When the bring this to your table you are immediately enamored because their are little pieces of tobiko that are dancing around the Yellowtail and the rice. However
column5: I must say that Â this dish was probably the least visibly appealing dish that we ordered. However
column6: this dish totally made up for it in aroma. The smell of the soy broth and the steaming rice and Yellowtail totally overtakes your senses. The various flavors and textures really make this dish a truly unique and special experience.
